parameters: \N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. It suits you, just as I thought it would.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey now, you're joking, right? It's a problem if you throw
in the towel on a job you've accepted halfway through.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I wasn't going to say this but, I've heard you've
been entering the ruins lately, not just for the jobs I've
asked of you?

\N<Shopkeeper>I don't know why, but there's no reason for a mere housewife
to take such risks. Could it be that you have some
circumstances?

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't be so distant, tell me everything. I intend to help
you out, you know?

\N<Shopkeeper>But of course, it can't be for free. I have my own
circumstances too. That's why I'm offering you this job.

\N<Shopkeeper>If you accept the job, not only will you get paid, but I can
also put in a good word for you at my acquaintance's
workshop to make something useful for your dives into the
ruins.

\N<Shopkeeper>See? It's not a bad deal for either of us, right? Think of
it as helping me out... okay?
\N<Shopkeeper>I know, I'll of course keep my promise.
\N<Segi>Um... are you really sure this will... that...

\N<Shopkeeper>Of course. It's not that difficult, right? Pouring drinks is
something even a grown woman should have some experience
with as a matter of sophistication, isn't it?

\N<Shopkeeper>Is that so? Either way, it's an easy task. As you can see,
I'm taking care to ensure your identity isn't revealed.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, if you understand, go entertain the customers. After
all, they come here for that very purpose.
\N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. You still look great in it, very beautiful?

\N<Shopkeeper>Ah, if you're worried about the customers recognizing you,
don't be. It was fine last time too, right?

\N<Shopkeeper>Besides... the eyes of drunkards are like sieve holes.
Unless it's blatantly obvious that Segi-san is here, they
can't even imagine it's really you.

\N<Shopkeeper>Come on, no need for unnecessary worries. The customers are
eagerly waiting. Do your best to entertain them?

\N<Shopkeeper>So, it's not that difficult, right? Pouring drinks is
something even a grown woman should have some experience
with as a matter of sophistication, isn't it?

\N<Shopkeeper>Is that so? Either way, it's an easy task. As you can see,
I'm taking care to ensure your identity isn't revealed.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, go entertain the customers downstairs. After all, they
come here for that very purpose.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, are you ready? You're getting quite good at this look,
aren't you?

\N<Shopkeeper>The customers' reactions are great too? Let's go and give it
our all at work today.

\N<Shopkeeper>You know, that outfit really suits you, ma'am. Use your
bewitching charm to entertain them today as well.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, hey, what's the matter? You've got a special request
today, you know? You need to show a little more spirit, or
it'll be troublesome.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I think I've said this many times. This is a give-
and-take contract. I won't consider your personal
circumstances. You receive compensation in return.

\N<Shopkeeper>There's nothing strange about it, right? Rather, I want you
to see this as an opportunity.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, now, as I said earlier, you have a special request from
a customer today. Please show them a sweet dream worth their
high payment.

\N<Shopkeeper>What's with the long face? This place is practically running
on customers who come for you. It's a problem if the star of
the show looks like that.

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't worry, nothing that happens in this shop will ever
leak outside. Of course, that includes Yuia-san and Riia
hearing about it.

\N<Shopkeeper>So relax and give the customers their sweet dreams today.
It's something only you can do, surely it's the pinnacle of
womanly satisfaction?

\N<Customer>Hey, shopkeeper! Where's today's entertainment waitress?
I've been waiting here, drinking this crappy cheap booze
just for that!
\N<Customer>Yeah, hurry it up! Don't act all high and mighty!

\N<Shopkeeper>Just wait patiently, we're preparing something special.
Today's girl is a real gem, so don't blame me if you faint
from excitement.

\N<Customer>A real gem, huh? Bullshit! Like this place could ever have a
woman of that caliber!
\N<Shopkeeper>Heh, we'll see about that. Just wait and enjoy the show.

\N<Customer>Hey, hey! This is definitely a gem! Shopkeeper! Where the
hell have you been hiding a woman like this until now!?

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh, see what I mean? Now, take your time drinking and spend
some money.

\N<Customer>Hahaha!! Nice, sister! You're quite exciting! Move your hips
more... seductively, please!

\N<Customer>Exactly, we're just sad men with nothing else to enjoy but a
drink here! Bless us tired souls with an angel's mercy, will
ya?

Forced to smile behind the hidden veil, Segi serves drinks
to the men.

The smile is far from angelic as demanded by the men, but
still, her graceful figure while serving raises vulgar
cheers from them.
\N<Customer>Hyahaha!! I like it! You're sexy, sister! Keep it up!

\N<Customer>Really, really! Being served by a beautiful woman like you
makes all the troubles with the training corps and the Luda
guys feel healed!! Hahahaha!!

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh, glad to hear it. The customers are all pleased. This
must be what you wanted too, right?

\N<Customer>Hahaha! That's right, we're extremely satisfied over here!
So sister, put some more spirit into it for us!

\N<Customer>But man, you're a quiet one, aren't you? Why don't you say
something instead of staying silent?
\N<Customer>Yeah, yeah, we're not into being served by dolls here!

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh, sorry about that. This girl just started working here
recently. Plus, she's extremely shy. That's why she's
dressed like this.

\N<Shopkeeper>But still... Look. You've got to respond to the customers'
requests at least a little bit.

The mouth hidden behind the veil tightens firmly. She must
avoid making any unnecessary sounds that could expose her
circumstances to the men.

\N<Segi>Welcome... everyone. Please enjoy your meal to your heart's
content...

Suppressing her voice and emotions, she strives to remain
calm and act like an obedient woman. It seemed like the
wisest choice in this situation.
\N<Customer>Hehehe! Sister! Just as I thought, you have a cute voice!
\N<Customer>What a waste to be silent! And that outfit suits you too!

\N<Customer>Alright, I've decided! I'm coming here every day from now
on! Then sister will give us more service, right!?

\N<Shopkeeper>Haha, is that so. That's great to hear. So I'll be counting
on you again, okay?
\N<Shopkeeper>Good work, ma'am. You were a big help, haha.

\N<Shopkeeper>Everyone was crazy about you. You were the center of
attention. Isn't that the best reward for a woman? Maybe
you're cut out for this kind of thing, ma'am?
\N<Segi>Suited for it...? That's not true at all.

\N<Shopkeeper>Is that so? Well, either way, you were a big help. If you
feel like it, come again. Next time, I'll make sure to give
you a bigger reward, okay?

\N<Shopkeeper>Hehe... Here's the promised reward. I'll be counting on you
again, alright?
\N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. It suits you, just as I thought it would.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey now, you're joking, right? It's a problem if you throw
in the towel on a job you've taken on halfway through.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I wasn't going to say this, but I've heard you've
been entering the ruins lately, not just for the jobs I've
asked of you.

\N<Shopkeeper>I don't know why, but there's no reason for an ordinary
housewife to take such risks. Maybe there's some
circumstance I'm not aware of?

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't be so distant, tell me anything. I intend to help you
out, you know?

\N<Shopkeeper>But of course, it can't be for free. I have my own
circumstances too. That's why I'm offering you this job.

\N<Shopkeeper>If you take on the job, not only will you get paid, but I
can also put in a good word for you at a friend's workshop
to make something useful for your dives into the ruins.

\N<Shopkeeper>See? It's not a bad deal for either of us, right? Think of
it as helping me out... okay?
\N<Shopkeeper>I know, I'll of course keep my promise.
\N<Segi>Um... are you really sure this will... that...

\N<Shopkeeper>Of course. It's not difficult, right? Pouring drinks is
something even a lady like yourself should have some
experience with, right?

\N<Shopkeeper>Is that so? Either way, it's a simple task. As you can see,
I'm taking care to ensure your identity isn't revealed.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, if you understand, go entertain the customers. After
all, they come here for that very purpose.

\N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. You always look good in it, very beautiful
indeed?

\N<Shopkeeper>Ah, if you're worried about the customers recognizing you,
don't be. It was fine last time too, right?

\N<Shopkeeper>Besides... the eyes of drunkards are like sieve holes.

can't even imagine it's really you.

right?

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, go entertain the customers downstairs. After all, they
come here for that very purpose.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, are you ready? You're getting quite good at this get-
up, aren't you?

\N<Shopkeeper>The customers' reactions are great too? Let's go and give it
our all at work today.

\N<Shopkeeper>You know, that outfit really suits you, ma'am. Use your
bewitching charm to entertain them today as well.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, hey, what's the matter? You've got a special request
today, you know? I need you to put a little more spirit into
it, or we'll be in trouble.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I think I've said this many times. This is a give-
and-take contract. I don't concern myself with your
circumstances. You get what you're due.

\N<Shopkeeper>There's nothing strange about it, right? Rather, I want you
to see this as an opportunity.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, now, as I said earlier, we have customers who've made
special requests today. Please show them a sweet dream worth
their high payment.

\N<Shopkeeper>What's with the long face? This place is practically running
on customers who come for you. It's a problem if the star of
the show looks like that, isn't it?

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't worry, nothing that happens in this shop will ever
leak outside. Of course, that includes Yuia-san and Riia
hearing about it.

\N<Shopkeeper>So relax and give the customers their sweet dreams today.
It's something only you can do, it's the epitome of a
woman's happiness, isn't it?

\N<Customer>Hey! Missy! Don't just pay attention to them, pour some for
us too!

Segi brushed off the vulgar catcalls from the men,
interacting as little as possible.

\N<Customer>Hehe! But seriously, Missy. You're wearing quite the outfit.
From here, I can see your cute ass completely!

The crude jeers from the men continued behind Segi. It was
no wonder, as her clothing was extremely short, and as the
man said, from behind she might as well have been naked.

\N<Customer>Hehe! Really, really! What a lewd outfit you've got on. The
shape of your cute ass is totally visible. Is this your
kink? Wanting to be seen more, huh?!

\N<Segi>Th-that's not...! It's not like that...! Please... don't
look...!

\N<Customer>Hehe, what's wrong with that? It's not like I'm asking to
touch or anything.

Even as she firmly rejected them, the man did not take his
eyes off Segi's body. Rather, increasingly vulgar gazes from
around the shop concentrated on her.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey hey, you've got to meet the customers' requests, you
know? We're paying good money for you after all.

\N<Shopkeeper>You understand, right? You're an adult. This is what we call
a contract. So, what do you think is the smartest choice to
make?

Segi, practically naked, served drinks to the men. Her face
was flushed with shame and humiliation.

\N<Shopkeeper>Yeah yeah... that's right, that's how you do it. Just smile
and serve the guys—it's an easy job.

\N<Shopkeeper>Come on now! Keep pouring for our dear customers! Make them
forget all their troubles!

\N<Customer>That's right! While you're at it, show us all of your
feminine charm!

\N<Customer>Or better yet, strip off those pesky clothes and serve us in
your birthday suit! Hahahaha!!

\N<Shopkeeper>Thanks for your hard work, ma'am. You've been a big help,
haha.

\N<Shopkeeper>All the customers were crazy about you today. Maybe this
kind of thing suits you, huh?

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't look so down. Personally, I'd like you to keep working
here forever. That way our sales will keep going up.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hehe... Here's the promised payment. I'll be counting on you
again, okay?
\N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. It suits you, just as I thought.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey now, you're joking, right? It's a problem if you throw
in the towel on a job you've taken halfway through.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I wasn't going to say this, but I've heard you've
been entering the ruins lately, not just for the jobs I've
asked of you.

\N<Shopkeeper>I don't know why, but there's no reason for a mere housewife

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, if you understand, go entertain the guests. After all,
they come here for that very purpose.
\N<Shopkeeper>Nice, ma'am. You always look good in it, very beautiful?

\N<Shopkeeper>Ah, if you're worried about the guests recognizing you,

\N<Shopkeeper>Besides... the eyes of drunkards are like sieve holes.
Unless it's blatantly obvious that Segi-san is here, they
can't even imagine it's really you.

eagerly waiting. Do your best to entertain them?

\N<Shopkeeper>So, it's not that difficult, right? Pouring drinks is
something even a grown woman should have some experience
with as a matter of sophistication.

\N<Shopkeeper>Is that so? Either way, it's an easy task. As you can see,
I'm being careful not to blow your cover.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, go entertain the guests downstairs. After all, they
come here for that very purpose.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, are you ready? You're getting quite good at this look,
aren't you?

\N<Shopkeeper>The guests' reactions are great too? Let's go and give it
our all at work today.

\N<Shopkeeper>You know, that outfit really suits you, ma'am. Use your
bewitching charm to entertain them today as well.

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey, hey, what's the matter? You've got a special request
today, you know? You need to show a little more spirit, or
we'll be in trouble.

\N<Shopkeeper>Ma'am, I think I've said this many times. This is a give-
and-take contract. I don't concern myself with your
circumstances. You get what you're due.

\N<Shopkeeper>There's nothing strange about it, right? Rather, I want you
to see this as an opportunity.

\N<Shopkeeper>Now, now, as I said earlier, we have guests with special
requests today. Please show them a sweet dream worth their
high payment.

\N<Shopkeeper>What's with the long face? This place is practically running
on customers who come for you. It's a problem if the star of
the show looks like that, isn't it?

\N<Shopkeeper>Don't worry, nothing that happens in this shop will ever
leak outside. Of course, Yuia-san and Riia won't hear about
it either.

\N<Shopkeeper>So go ahead and show the guests a sweet dream today with
peace of mind. It's something only you can do, it's the
ultimate joy for a woman, isn't it?
\N<Segi>Ah, um... Are you really sure about this... that...

\N<Shopkeeper>Yeah, I think so. It's not a difficult request. A lady as
splendid as you should have some experience with this sort
of thing as part of her feminine charms, right?

\N<Shopkeeper>Anyway, there's no need to worry so much. Just think of it
as part of the job, and entertain the lonely guys drinking
in the shop, will you?

\N<Customer>Nice one, sister! You're pretty good at this! That seductive
sway of your hips is irresistible!

Forced to smile, Segi dances an enchanting dance in front of
the men.

Underneath the veil, her face bears a smile she could never
truly mean as one of heartfelt service to the customers, but
even so, her supple body elicits vulgar cheers from the men.

\N<Customer>Hehehe!! You're so sexy! Keep it up, please! Watching a
beautiful babe like you dance makes us forget all about
those pointless military drills and the Ludan guys! Haha!

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh heh, that's great, ma'am. As you can see, the customers
are thrilled. This must be very satisfying for a woman,
right?

The shopkeeper approaches Segi quietly and speaks in a
whisper so that no other customer can hear.

\N<Customer>Hahaha! That's the spirit! After all, we came here to see
this! Who would come to such a place with nothing but lousy
booze if not for this?!

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh heh, you flatter me. Well then, shall we fulfill our
customers' requests soon?

\N<Shopkeeper>Dancer, how about you start removing those bothersome pieces
of cloth one by one?

Forgetting to smile at this suggestion, Segi's expression
freezes over. She can't comprehend the shopkeeper's demand
instantly.

\N<Customer>Heheh! Been waiting for this!! Sister! Hurry up and take off
that annoying outfit! You'll get stiff shoulders if you keep
it on like that! Heheh!

\N<Shopkeeper>Can't wait. Didn't I tell you? This is strictly business.
You're here to entertain these guys. In return, you get
paid. What's there to be dissatisfied about?

\N<Shopkeeper>The money I'm paying you isn't small change. So you've got
to do whatever you can, right?
\N<Shopkeeper>Or... do you have some other way to entertain these guys?

\N<Shopkeeper>Right? So there's no helping it, is there? Besides, if you
don't hurry up, the customers will start making a fuss.

\N<Shopkeeper>Well... if you absolutely refuse, then that can't be helped.
Go find some other place that pays well. Maybe sell that
attractive body of yours... eh?

As Yuia's wife, she couldn't possibly sell her body. She
couldn't betray the person she loves.

However, she is the only one who can sustain her husband's
life, which isn't even guaranteed until tomorrow. This
conflict entangles her.

To that end, she convinces herself that even her current
appearance in this lewd outfit has meaning. And so Segi
reaches for her costume with a determined look.

\N<Shopkeeper>Come on, come on! The moment everyone's been waiting for has
arrived? Everyone came here for this reason! Take a good
look!

Segi drops one piece of her costume onto the floor.
Instantly, cheers erupt from the men.

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh heh, now how about a greeting for our customers? As a
dancer, shouldn't you say a word or two?
\N<Segi>H-how is it...? My dance... are you enjoying it?

\N<Customer>Heheheh! Oh yeah! We're enjoying it alright! But you know
what? To truly enjoy ourselves without any reservations, it
feels like we're missing just one more thing!

\N<Shopkeeper>Heh heh, such greedy customers. You heard them, ma'am. It's
a request from our customers? How about one more piece?
\N<Segi>S-such a thing! I can't... any more than this...!

\N<Shopkeeper>After coming this far, you can't say that now? The rest is
all the same. You were prepared for this much when you came
here, weren't you?

\N<Shopkeeper>I'm not saying you should serve for free. I'm willing to pay
you accordingly. But then, you have to try harder to
entertain these guys, right?

Again. This scoundrel's threats are always the same.
However... I couldn't defy him.
\N<Customer>Ahahaha!! This is great! She's practically naked!!

\N<Segi>Are you... satisfied...? I would like you to fully...
enjoy... my dance.
\N<Customer>Hahaha! Who can focus on the dance!

\N<Customer>Exactly! With such a lewd outfit, shaking your ass and
breasts, our eyes are drawn to your body!
She bites her lip in frustration and shame.

In an outfit that's almost like underwear, she shakes her
hips in front of the men. She desperately holds back tears
from the humiliation and feeling of powerlessness.

\N<Customer>By the way... what do you think about that story? Is Yuia
really caught by the Luda guys?

\N<Customer>Who knows... Well, even if that's true, I wonder if he knows
that his wife is dancing like a madwoman in front of people
in such an outfit?

\N<Customer>If it were me, I couldn't stand knowing my wife was earning
money by dancing almost naked like this in such a place!

\N<Customer>Heh, hehe... Right? But, well... A married woman exposing
herself to unknown men for the sake of her beloved husband,
that's kind of exciting too... hehe.

\N<Customer>Hey hey, the dance has stopped? A dancer should always
provide the best hospitality to the audience in front of
her.

\N<Customer>We're paying money for that. If you can't do it, shall we
take off another piece?

\N<Customer>That's right, that's right! Show everyone here your precious
parts!
\N<Segi>Th-that's... No! I can't... not any more...!!

\N<Shopkeeper>Hey hey, ma'am. Hurry up, will you? Don't make me say the
same thing over and over. You're the dancer of this
establishment now, aren't you?
\N<Segi>But still... No! I can't... do any more...!

Ignoring Segi's hesitation, the surrounding men forcefully
stripped off her underwear. Her genitals were exposed, and
all eyes were focused on her.
\N<Customer>Oooh! Nice! To let us worship even down there!!

Frozen with her genitals exposed, Segi couldn't do anything
but stand still. She couldn't understand why she was going
through this.

\N<Customer>Heheh!! It's your fault, sis! You wouldn't take it off, so I
helped you out!!
\N<Shopkeeper>Thanks for the hard work, ma'am. That helped a lot, haha.
\N<Segi>Of course I am... Such a thing...

\N<Shopkeeper>But the customers were thrilled. It wouldn't have been the
same with me or the other waiters. It's something only you
could do as a wife.

\N<Shopkeeper>Haha, that's up to you. I can't force you. But... if you're
ever willing, our establishment will always welcome you with
open arms?

\N<Shopkeeper>Here... your promised payment. I'll be counting on you
again?
